content: My grandson has a kitten. The kitten has white and black fur and greenish eyes. My grandson loves playing with it. He named it Vivi. Vivi is beautiful. It is our pet.
translations: ita:Mio nipote ha una gattina. La gattina ha la pelliccia bianca e nera e gli occhi verdognoli. Mio nipote ama giocare con l
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
